text:
VI Company | https://www.vicompany.nl | Rotterdam, NL | on-site full time

VI Company is specialized in engaging web applications for financial markets. We build solutions for stock exchanges, banks and other financial institutions. As .NET back-end developer at VI Company you'll be responsible for processing complex (high frequency) data and building web applications. Your team (back-end developer, front-end developer and designer) is responsible for its own projects. We currently work with four teams and a dedicated support team.

We're located in Rotterdam (The Netherlands) next to the Central Station in a great office. Speaking Dutch is not a requirement, we work for financial institutions throughout Europe. More information (in Dutch) and our contact details can be found on http://werkenbij.vicompany.nl/software-developer.
